# cubic_bezier_easing_function class

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/scenegraph/keyframedmovement/cubic_bezier_easing_function
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T02:44:56.801160

---

Cubic bezier easing function. See CubicBezierEasingFunctions for some basic easing values.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /Verse.org/SceneGraph/KeyframedMovement }` |

| --- | --- |
| [`easing_function`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/scenegraph/keyframedmovement/easing_function) | Base class for an animation easing function. |
